quests.name: Lift the Curse on the Eerie Ruins
quests.description: Embark on a quest to lift the ancient curse that shrouds the 'Eerie Ruins.' Seek out the 'Cursed Guardians' and confront 'Spectral Phantoms' to uncover the source of the curse.

quests.name: Recover the Lost Tome of Shadows
quests.description: Discover the 'Lost Tome of Shadows' hidden deep within the 'Eerie Ruins.' Navigate treacherous traps and decipher cryptic runes while fending off 'Cursed Guardians' to claim the tome.

quests.name: Echoes of the Past
quests.description: Uncover 'Echoes of the Past' by investigating spectral visions within the ruins. Solve puzzles left by ancient inhabitants and unravel the 'Forgotten Ritual' to ease the spirits' torment.

quests.name: Whispers in the Darkness
quests.description: Listen to the 'Whispers in the Darkness' that emanate from the ruins. Follow cryptic clues and navigate the labyrinthine passages to find the 'Cryptic Relics.' Beware of 'Haunting Whispers.'

quests.name: Restoring Lost Memories
quests.description: Aid a tormented spirit in 'Restoring Lost Memories.' Unearth fragments of the spirit's past scattered throughout the ruins. Face 'Memory Guardians' and recover 'Forgotten Emblems.'
